channel.title: Questions about pimpscape
channel.description:
1. how can i chanse range that you wont hit to high because i removed it now all. 2. give me please a code for ice barrage that it would work good and you will stand still for like 20 secs. 3. can you give me a code that i can use a command that you will get a glow around you like dragon b axe special att and merlin's crystal quest item :p 4. i got pimpscape much codes i had about ice barrage wont work.
PIMPSCAPE[br][size=1]Posted on: August 08, 2007, 07:06:38 AM[/size][hr]bumping

item.title: Questions about pimpscape

item.description:
@anuslikker wrote:

thnx and it works i found it

btw some else can help me again??

how do I add some objects to the server?

Read full topic

item.title: Questions about pimpscape
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

For range, you gotta find the hit diff for each bow. Or just be lazy and do it for the 1-3 bows your server has.

if(UseBow){ inCombat(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; CheckArrows(); CalculateRange(); if(RangeHit(AttackingOn)) hitDiff = misc.random(20); else hitDiff = 25; }

Read full topic
